item.title: Hookah Haze
item.description:
Title: Hookah Haze
Genre: Adventure
Developer: ACQUIRE Corp.
Publisher: Aniplex Inc.
Release Date: Jul 10, 2024




About This Game

◆Introduction


In the year 2XXX, on the quiet outskirts of Akihabara, a new hookah lounge called "Hookah Haze" opens its doors.

As the new manager, Toru Sumiki, you will engage in heartfelt conversations with a variety of unique and colorful patrons, gradually discovering changes within your own heart.
Enjoy serene and tranquil nights while immersing yourself in these captivating interactions.

◆Game Features


・ Experience the individual stories of each heroine, with a total gameplay time of around 10 hours.
・The heroines visiting the lounge will change based on the recommended recipes shared on social media.
・Each heroine's story has multiple endings influenced by the choices made throughout the game.
・Achieve the happy endings for all three heroines to unlock new endings and discover more about the story.

◆Story


"Anything you want to try doing?"
The protagonist, Toru Sumiki, loses the will to live after being diagnosed with a fatal illness.
Toru's doctor insists they should make the most of the little time they have left,
and they sign on as a temporary manager of a hookah lounge.

Through this new job, Toru meets three very unusual girls.
Although cheerful at a glance, they're battling with work problems or past trauma,
searching for a place to belong.
As Toru begins to bond with them through hookah,
what will they find once the girls fully open up?

◆Characters


Amu Aigami

"Don't skimp on praise for me, I deserve it!"


Birthday: November 11. 23 years old. Blood type: B.
Novelty cafe employee at Akihabara. Thirsty for attention, loves to be spoiled. Absolutely loves herself.



Meigetsuin Kokoro

"Ever thought being alive was overrated?"


Birthday: June 21. 27 years old. Blood type: A.
Store clerk.
Polite, intelligent and usually optimistic, but hides past trauma.



Kurumi Komori

"Nuts!"


Birthday: July 22. 21 years old. Blood type: B.
A doll-maker employed by a big business.
Comes off as willful. Not a great communicator.



Toru Sumiki

"I'd like to connect with someone through my interests."


25 years old. Blood type: AB
Hookah Haze's temporary manager.
Has a tendency to give up on their own desires and put others before themself.
Loves hookah and fish tanks.

◆DEMO

Enjoy a unique story not found in the main game.
Live through two days in the hookah lounge, with different outcomes based on the patrons who visit.
Replay the game to uncover all the different stories.
※Note: Progress from the demo will not carry over to the full version.
※In the full version, the "ANOTHER DAY" feature will allow you to experience the same content as the DEMO.

◆Staff

Planning and development: ACQUIRE
Sales: ANIPLEX






Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or later
    • Processor: Core i5-10300H
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1500 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or later
    • Processor: Core i5-10600K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1500 MB available space

item.title: OUTBRK
item.description:
Title: OUTBRK
Genre: Action , Adventure , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Sublime
Publisher: Sublime
Franchise: OUTBRK
Release Date: Jun 28, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jun 28, 2024




About This Game

OUTBRK is a storm chasing simulation game being developed for PC set in a fictive reproduction of America’s tornado alley. Experience the wonder of nature and compete against other chasers as you put yourself into random scenarios based on real life weather events. Prepare to have too close for comfort encounters with tornadoes, fight your way through torrential downpours, while avoiding hazards of extreme weather.

Take the role of a professional storm chaser and make use of your risk management skills to gather valuable data from severe weather. Become the chaser you’ve always wanted to be by buying new vehicles, upgrading them, and customizing them.

OUTBRK features a 625 square kilometers map with various landmarks such as rivers, canyons, plains, towns and forests.

So tighten your seat belt, and get ready for OUTBRK: The Multiplayer Storm Chasing Experience.

item.title: Pizza Hero
item.description:
Title: Pizza Hero
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie , RPG , Free to Play
Developer: Astro Hound
Publisher: Astro Hound
Release Date: Jun 27, 2024




About This Game

INTRODUCTION

Welcome to Pizza Hero, the exciting new shoot 'em up roguelite that puts a delicious twist on the genre! In this game, you'll play as a brave pizza who must defend the world from an invasion of enemies.




As you battle your way through the game, you'll have the opportunity to choose from a variety of different toppings that will grant you special abilities. For example, selecting pepperoni will give you a grenade, allowing you to deal splash damage. Or, if you're feeling saucy, you can choose blue cheese to create a pungent parameter around your pizza, damaging any foes that come too close.

GAMEPLAY

Pizza Hero is a swarm survivor, meaning that you'll need to use all of your skills and strategies to take down waves of relentless enemies. With randomly generated levels and power-ups, no two playthroughs are ever the same. To help you in your quest, the game features an auto-rotate feature that allows you to easily switch between targeting groups without having to manually rotate.


So if you're ready to rise to the challenge and defend the world from the forces of evil, wishlist Pizza Hero now!

CONTENT OVERVIEW

  • 15+ Damage Toppings
  • 6+ Passive Toppings
  • Upgradable overall stats
  • Auto rotate/firing controls (with option to focus different enemy types - Tank, Damage and Support)
  • Endless gameplay
  • Survive waves to unlock the next stage

WARNING

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo CPU (or AMD equivalent)
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 100 MB available space

item.title: Oh Deer
item.description:
Title: Oh Deer
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie
Developer: Cozy Cabin Studios
Publisher: Cozy Cabin Studios
Release Date: Jun 27, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Mar 15, 2024




About This Game

Oh Deer is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game where one player plays as a hunter and up to four others play as deer.

Hunter Role

The hunter's role is to use sound, gadgets, and pure skill to locate and eliminate the other players before nightfall. However, knowing if the deer in your sights is a player or not is the true challenge.

Deer Role

The Deer's role is to hide from the hunter by blending in with a handful of AI deer scattered around the map. Eating food is a priority to keep hunger at bay. But improper timing when eating could mean the difference between life and death.

The Map

Forests are the perfect place to hide. With lots of trees, bushes, and cute flowers, deer can live happily for years without any worries. That is, until hunting season begins... Tall trees, thick bushes, and plenty of shade sets up a perfect ambush.

item.title: Sarah's Adventure: Time Travel
item.description:
Title: Sarah's Adventure: Time Travel
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy , Free to Play
Developer: NUTS POWER ONLINE ENTERTAINMENT LIMITED
Publisher: NUTS POWER ONLINE ENTERTAINMENT LIMITED
Release Date: Jun 25, 2024




About This Game

Step into 'Sarah's Adventure: Time Travel', an enchanting game that sends players on a captivating journey through space and time. This game unearths the essence of adventure by combining elements of exploration and puzzle-solving. As players navigate through various locations around the globe, they are tasked with clearing obstacles and unraveling challenges, truly engaging the player's wit and strategy.

The game’s appeal lies in its interactive gameplay mechanics, where your choices dictate the progression of the story. Dive into a meticulously crafted world, build and manage resources effectively, and restore historical artifacts to their former glory. 'Sarah's Adventure' is not just a game; it's a chronicle of thrilling escapades and the celebration of human curiosity, designed to intrigue, delight, and immerse audiences in its narrative richness.

Immerse yourself in the engaging tale of Sarah, a young professional from a world-class museum, who finds herself suddenly transported to the nineteenth century. Can you survive the sands of time and help Sarah find her way back?
